name: BLIND QUEST - The Frost Demon
description:
Blind Quest is a fantasy role-playing game.
A new story begins in the world of Blind Quest.
In this stand-alone chapter, "THE FROST DEMON", you will guide Nathan in a NEW ADVENTURE in the world of Aetherna.
Nathan arrives in the prosperous Willow City in search of wealth and glory, but soon realizes that the city is besieged by evil.
The Frost Demon is freezing the Willow City, only Nathan can save it's people!
Explore new locatHis ice magic has frozen the whole island. Try to kill him to make the region thrive again!ions!
From the rich Willow City to a vulcanic island and an abbey invaded by a dark cult!
Are you ready to explore the mysterious Willow Island?
